treatments_requested.name: Hoyer Lift
treatments_requested.other_or_notes: Mechanical transfer device for mobility assistance

soc_details: Mechanical transfer devices are well-accepted instruments in the care of patients who are dependent for mobility, both for patients and caregiver safety.

study_details.key_findings: Mechanical transfer devices are well-accepted instruments in the care of patients who are dependent for mobility.
Mechanical transfer devices are well-accepted instruments in the care of patients who are dependent for mobility.

rationale: The requested additional sling for the patient’s Hoyer lift is not medically necessary as the current slings are not in disrepair or in need of replacement.
